definition: abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
(loanword) caliph/also written 哈利發|哈利发[ha1 li4 fa1]

pinyin: Ha1 li3 sen1 · Shi1 mi4 te4

definition: Burj Khalifa, skyscraper in Dubai, 830 m high
Caliphate (Islamic empire formed after the death of the Prophet Mohammed 穆罕默德 in 632)

sentences.english: Harris removes it and smashes it on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 哈里斯拿掉了这个装置，并用脚踩碎在地上。

sentences.english: The findings contradict statements made by Halliburton in the weeks following the accident.
sentences.chinese: 该发现反驳了哈里伯顿在事故发生后一周的说法。

sentences.english: But Professor Harrison said that the SPP has far more ambitious goals.
sentences.chinese: 但哈里森教授表示，SPP的目标要宏伟得多。

sentences.english: Harry had considerable success dapping with the natural fly.
sentences.chinese: 哈里用真蝇轻点水面钓鱼相当成功。

sentences.english: Nobody , neither hareton nor zillah , is to know.
sentences.chinese: 没有人知道，哈里顿或拉也不知道。

sentences.english: In March, Hareton had had an accident and been confined to the farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，哈里顿发生了一起事故，并被囚禁在了农舍。

sentences.english: Harry, you help little Dave. " Mr."
sentences.chinese: 哈里，你去帮一下小戴夫。

sentences.english: Jack and Harry bunked together at camp.
sentences.chinese: 杰克和哈里在军营里合铺。

sentences.english: Frank doesn't care if Harry leaves or stays.
sentences.chinese: 佛兰克根本不在意哈里是去还是留。

sentences.english: Mr Harrison called a meeting of the directors on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 哈里逊先生星期二召集了一次主任会议。

sentences.english: They claimed that Harrison could not read or write.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称哈里森不会读书，不会写字。

sentences.english: “They develop a new obsession, ” Hullett says.
sentences.chinese: “她们患上了新的强迫症，”哈里特说。

sentences.english: Hareton grew black as a thunder cloud, at this childish speech.
sentences.chinese: 哈里顿听了这一套孩子气的话，脸像阴云一般黑。

sentences.english: "He (Horford) was the guy; there wasnteven a question, " Harris said.
sentences.chinese: “他是一个硬汉，这似乎毫无疑问，”哈里斯说到。

sentences.english: It happened that Harrison was sleeping in the room.
sentences.chinese: 可巧那时哈里森正在屋里睡觉。

definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
